May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
This, I can justify. I don’t like her for 45 points as well as I like the 005 Captain America, but this is a cost where I can use her for her Leadership, SHIELD TA, maybe she’ll take a Mastermind for someone. Her starting Invincible is unique among the Commons (and Party Thor in the Rares is the only other below Chase level). A solid soldier.
May 2, 2022
Goop
For 50pts shes a good piece to just carry around, you get defend of 18 thanks to the shield and leadership. Hard to kill too with 18 invincible. If in fact hit then your giving your main guy defend PLUS the +1 def boost. So i like her a lot at this value as a support piece.
